bibl.title: The Proem of Simonides' Plataea Elegy and the Circumstances of Its Performance.
The New Simonides. Contexts of Praise and Desire
bibl.note: An earlier version of this paper appeared as: The Proem of the Simonides Elegy on the Battle of Plataea (Sim. frs. 10-18 W2) and the Circumstances of Its Performance, Poet, Public, and Performance in Ancient Greece (Baltimore - London, 1997) pp. 8-28. - I.E.G. II2, Simonides, 10-18 (in part. 11). - Introductory Comments on the Text. - Introductory Remarks on the Elegy. - Simonides' Elegy. - The Epic and the Lyrical Proem. - Occasion and Commission. - Conclusion.
